people.name: Tim Ferriss
people.bio: Tim Ferriss is an American entrepreneur, investor, author, podcaster, and lifestyle guru. He is known for his 4-Hour self-help book series and hosts one of the most popular podcasts in the world, 'The Tim Ferriss Show.'

people.name: Naval Ravikant
people.bio: Naval Ravikant is an entrepreneur, angel investor, and philosopher. He is the co-founder of AngelList and has invested in over 200 companies including Uber, Twitter, and Yammer.

people.name: Brené Brown
people.bio: Brené Brown is a research professor at the University of Houston where she holds the Huffington Foundation Endowed Chair. She has spent two decades studying courage, vulnerability, shame, and empathy.

people.name: Sam Harris
people.bio: Sam Harris is an American philosopher, neuroscientist, author, and podcast host. His work touches on a wide range of topics including rationality, religion, ethics, free will, neuroscience, and meditation.

people.name: Malcolm Gladwell
people.bio: Malcolm Gladwell is a Canadian journalist, author, and public speaker. He has been a staff writer for The New Yorker since 1996 and has published seven books including The Tipping Point and Outliers.

people.name: Esther Perel
people.bio: Esther Perel is a psychotherapist known for her work on human relationships. She has authored two New York Times bestsellers and hosts the podcast 'Where Should We Begin?'

people.name: Lex Fridman
people.bio: Lex Fridman is an AI researcher at MIT and host of the Lex Fridman Podcast. His podcast features long-form conversations about science, technology, history, philosophy, and the nature of intelligence.

people.name: Andrew Huberman
people.bio: Andrew Huberman is a neuroscientist and tenured professor in the Department of Neurobiology at Stanford University School of Medicine. He hosts the popular Huberman Lab podcast.

people.name: Simon Sinek
people.bio: Simon Sinek is a British-American author and motivational speaker. He is best known for popularizing the concept of 'the golden circle' and his TED Talk 'How Great Leaders Inspire Action.'

people.name: Ryan Holiday
people.bio: Ryan Holiday is an American author, marketer, and entrepreneur. He is known for his books on Stoic philosophy including The Obstacle Is The Way and Ego Is The Enemy.

people.name: Kobe Bryant
people.bio: Kobe Bryant is an American author, marketer, and entrepreneur. He is known for his books on Stoic philosophy including The Obstacle Is The Way and Ego Is The Enemy.
